nodes.text: A Barsen'thor of the Jedi Order owned a personal lightsaber. After his death, the lightsaber was placed in his tomb.

The hilt of the First Blade was recovered by the the Barsen'thor at the time of the Cold War. This Jedi then mounted the hilt into a lightsaber, complete with a  green crystal that had been found in the Tythonian Forge. Yuon Par, the Consular's Jedi master. While Fess stood guard, the Consular deeply concentrated and used the machine to create a working lightsaber.
Depending on the player's advanced class, lightsaber could be a single-bladed or a double-bladed lightsaber.
